data.name: Lords of Xulima - The Talisman of Golot
data.detailed_description:
The Talisman of Golot

With this extension for Lords of Xulima, you will start the adventure with a very special artifact: The Talisman of Golot. Known as "The Voice of Golot", this artifact not only can speak with you but also has the ability to aid you by granting wishes when you need it the most.

The Gifts of the Artifact

The artifact has a very special wisdom. He can guide you on your mission; speak with it whenever you find yourself lost in the huge continent of Xulima. Their special senses even can alert you when the terrible Cursed Hounds come for you. The Talisman can teleport you to a safe place and transform its energy into gold or food. It can purify curses or cure even the worst of diseases. It can even enlighten you with its knowledge, to improve your attributes and skills.

The Spheres of Power

There are 50 spheres of power hidden in Xulima. Find them to feed the Talisman with energy. This gentle artifact will be grateful to you, by granting your wishes.

data.supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, French, German, Polish, Italian, Simplified Chinese, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Windows XP
  • Процессор: Intel or AMD dual core 2Ghz
  • Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: DirectX 9.0 or OpenGL 2.1 Compatible Card
  • DirectX: Версии 9.0c
  • Место на диске: 1500 MB
pc_requirements.recommended:
Рекомендованные:
  • ОС: Windows 7 64 bits
  • Процессор: Intel or AMD dual coer 3Ghz
  • Оперативная память: 4 MB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: DirectX 9.0 or OpenGL 2.1 Compatible Card
  • DirectX: Версии 9.0c
  • Место на диске: 1500 MB

mac_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Mac OS X 10.6 Snow Leopard
  • Процессор: Dual Core 2Ghz
  • Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: AMD Radeon 4670, NVIDIA GT 240, Intel HD4000
  • Место на диске: 2 GB
  • Дополнительно: The first time you start the game can take one or two minutes due to pre-processing that the game needs to do.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Рекомендованные:
  • ОС: Mac OS X 10.8 Mountain Lyon
  • Процессор: Quad Core 3Ghz
  • Оперативная память: 4 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: AMD Radeon 5870, NVIDIA GTX 260
  • Место на диске: 2 GB
  • Дополнительно: The first time you start the game can take one or two minutes due to pre-processing that the game needs to do.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Ubuntu 14+
  • Процессор: Dual Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: ATI Radeon HD 4650 / NVIDIA GeForce GT 240 / Intel HD 3000 Graphics, or equivalent
  • Место на диске: 2 GB
  • Дополнительно: SO and Steam Client fully updated.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Рекомендованные:
  • ОС: Ubuntu 14+
  • Процессор: Quad Core 3 Ghz
  • Оперативная память: 4 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: AMD Radeon 5870, NVIDIA GTX 260
  • Место на диске: 2 GB
  • Дополнительно: SO and Steam Client fully updated.
